content: Ntawm nuav yog tug TSWV cov lug has rua Npeelis tug tub Hauxeyas tam kws Yauxiyas, Yauthaas, Ahas hab Hexekiyas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yudas hab Yehau-as tug tub Yelaunpau-aas ua vaajntxwv kaav tebchaws Yixalayees.

Thawj zag kws tug TSWV has rua Hauxeyas, mas nwg has tas: “Koj ca le moog yuav quaspuj; koj tug quaspuj yuav tsi muab sab npuab koj, hab koj cov mivnyuas yuav coj ib yaam le nwg.  Kuv tsaav tuabneeg tso kuv tseg, hab moog ua cov tuabneeg kws tsi muaj lub sab ncaaj rua kuv ib yaam le ntawd.”
Yog le ntawd, Hauxeyas txhaj moog yuav Nkaumes kws yog Dinpelayees tug ntxhais ua quaspuj. Thaus obtug yug tau thawj tug tub lawm,

tug TSWV has rua Hauxeyas has tas, “Koj tis nwg lub npe hu ua ‘Yexelees’ rua qhov tshuav tsi ntev lawm kuv yuav rau txim rua tug vaajntxwv kws kaav cov Yixalayees, vim nwg yawmkoob Yehus tau tua tuabneeg huv lub nroog Yexelees.  Kuv yuav ua kuas Yehus caajceg vaajntxwv  tuag tu noob nrho moog.
Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd kuv yuav ua kuas cov tubrog Yixalayees raug puamtsuaj taag rua huv lub Vuaghaav Yexelees.”
Tom qaab ntawd Nkaumes yug tau ib tug ntxhais. Tug TSWV has rua Hauxeyas has tas, “Koj tis nwg lub npe hu ua ‘Tsi hlub’, rua qhov kuv yuav tsi hlub cov Yixalayees lossis tsi zaam txim rua puab lawm.

Tabsis kuv yuav hlub cov Yudas. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav cawm puab, tabsis tsi yog kuv siv ntaaj lossis neevnti, hab xub vug lossis neeg hab tubrog caij neeg lug cawm puab.”
Thaus kws Nkaumes tug ntxhais tseg taug mig lawm, nwg rov suab mivnyuas hab yug tau ib tug tub.
Tug TSWV has rua Hauxeyas has tas, “Koj tis nwg lub npe hu ua ‘Tsi Yog Kuv Tsaav Tuabneeg’ rua qhov cov Yixalayees tsi yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg hab kuv tsi yog puab tug Vaajtswv lawm.”

Cov Yixalayees yuav coob ib yaam le tej xuabzeb ntawm ntug havtxwv kws tsi muaj leejtwg suav txheeb lossis luj tau. Nwgnuav Vaajtswv has rua puab tas, “Mej tsi yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg.” Tabsis muaj ib nub nwg yuav has rua puab tas, “Mej yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob moog ibtxhis cov mivnyuas!”

Cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees yuav rov lug sis sau ua ke ua ib tsaav tuabneeg dlua. Puab yuav xaiv ib tug lug ua puab tug thawjcoj, puab yuav rov fuamvaam hab vaammeej dlua nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Yuav muaj le ntawd tag, Yexelees  nub yuav yog nub kws tseemceeb heev!
Yog le ntawd, ca le hu koj cov kwvtij Yixalayees has tas “Vaajtswv Tsaav Tuabneeg” hab “Cov Kws Tug TSWV Hlub.”
“Kuv cov mivnyuas, mej ca le thov mej nam, txawm has tas nwg tsi yog kuv tug quaspuj hab kuv tsi yog nwg tug quasyawg los mej thov kuas nwg tso txujkev ua nkauj ua nraug hab ua namndlav tseg.

Yog nwg tsi tso tej ntawd tseg, kuv yuav muab nwg tej rig tsho hle kuas nwg nyob labqaab ploog ib yaam le nub kws nwg yug lug. Kuv yuav ua kuas nwg qhuav ib yaam le lub tebchaws kws qhuav nkig nkuav, hab nwg yuav nqhes dlej tuag.

Kuv yuav tsi hlub nwg cov mivnyuas, rua qhov puab yog tug namndlav kws tsi paub txaajmuag cov mivnyuas.  Nwg tseem has tas, ‘Kuv yuav caum kuv cov hluas nraug moog, puab maam muab zaub mov, dlej haus, ntaub plaub yaaj, ntaub maag, roj txiv ntoo hab cawv txiv maab rua kuv.’ ”
Yog le ntawd kuv yuav muab xuavpaug xov vaaj ncig nwg hab xov laajkaab thaiv nwg txuj hauv kev.

Nwg yuav caum nwg cov hluas nraug qaab, tabsis nwg caum tsi cuag puab. Nwg yuav moog nrhav puab, tabsis nrhav tsi tau. Ces nwg yuav has tas, “Kuv yuav rov moog nrug kuv thawj tug quasyawg nyob, yaav taag lug kuv lub neej yeej zoo tshaaj taamsim nuav lawm ntau.”
Nwg yuav tsi kaam leeg has tas tej nplej, tej cawv txiv maab, tej roj txiv ntoo hab taagnrho tej nyaj tej kub kws nwg pheej coj moog fij rua Npa-aas ntawd yog kuv muab rua nwg.

Yog le ntawd thaus txug caij sau qoob kuv yuav muab tej nplej hab tej cawv txiv maab kws kuv muab pub rua nwg lawm coj rov lug, hab kuv yuav muab tej ntaub plaub yaaj hab tej ntaub maag kws kuv muab rua nwg xaws ua rig tsho naav coj rov lug huv tuabsi.
Kuv yuav muab nwg hle labqaab taabmeeg nwg tej hluas nraug, hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg muaj cuabkaav cawm tau nwg kuas dlim ntawm kuv txhais teg.
Kuv yuav ua kuas nwg tej rooj noj rooj haus kws naj xyoo hab naj hli ua, tej kevcai nub Xanpataus hab tej rooj noj haus kws nwg teem tseg ntawd kuas tu nrho moog.

Kuv yuav muab tej txiv maab hab txiv ncuav pas kws nwg khaav has tas, yog nwg cov hluas nraug muab them nwg, rua qhov nwg nrug puab ua nkauj ua nraug, ua kuas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi. Kuv yuav muab nwg tej vaaj txiv maab hab txiv ncuav pas ua kuas qhuav ib yaam le mojsaab qhua, tej tsaj qus yuav lug muab ua kuas puamtsuaj taag.
Kuv yuav rau txim rua nwg vim nwg tsi ncu qaab kuv lawm, nwg tau moog hlawv tshuaj tsw qaab rua Npa-aas, hab coj saw nyaj saw kub moog caum nwg cov hluas nraug qaab. Tug TSWV yog tug has le ntawd.
Yog le ntawd, kuv yuav coj nwg moog tso rua tom taj suabpuam dlua; kuv has lug mog lug muas rua nwg, txhaj coj tau nwg rov lug.

Kuv yuav muab nwg tej vaaj txiv maab rov qaab rua nwg hab muab lub Haav Covnyom hloov ua lub roojloog kws ca sab tau. Nwg yuav teb kuv tej lug ib yaam le thaus nwg tseem hluas kws nwg nyavnyuas lug nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Nwg yuav rov hu kuv ua nwg tug quasyawg. Nwg yuav tsi hu kuv ua nwg tug Npa-aas  ntxiv lawm.
Kuv yuav tsi pub nwg has txug Npa-aas lub npe ib zag le lawm.

Lub sijhawm ntawd kuv yuav coglug rua tej tsaj qus hab tej noog kuas tsi xob lug tum kuv tsaav tuabneeg. Kuv yuav tshem tej cuabyeej ua rog tawm huv lub tebchaws moog kuas taag, tsi has tej ntaaj, hab tej neevnti; kuv yuav ca kuv tsaav tuabneeg nyob kaaj sab lug hab muaj kev thaajyeeb.
Yixalayees, kuv yuav yuav koj ua kuv tug quaspuj; Kuv yuav ua ncaaj hab muab sab npuab koj; Kuv yuav hlub hab mov tshua koj hab yuav koj ua kuv tug moog ibtxhis le.
Kuv yuav ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg hab yuav koj ua kuv tug, hab koj yuav leeg yuav kuv ua koj tug TSWV.
Lub sijhawm ntawd, kuv yuav teb kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees  tej lug thov. Kuv yuav tso naag lug rua huv lub nplajteb nuav, ces lub nplajteb yuav tuaj qoobloo, txiv maab hab txiv ntoo roj.

Kuv yuav tsaa kuv tsaav tuabneeg rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd hab ua kuas puab vaammeej. Kuv yuav hlub cov tuabneeg kws muaj lub npe hu has tas, “Tsi Hlub,” hab hlub cov tuabneeg kws hu has tas, “Tsi Yog Kuv Tsaav Tuabneeg,” kuv yuav has tas, “Mej yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg.” Hab puab yuav teb has tas, “Koj yog peb tug Vaajtswv.”

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog  hlub tug quaspuj kws moog ntxag hluas nraug lawm. Koj yuavtsum hlub nwg ib yaam le kuv tseem hlub cov Yixalayees, txawm yog puab tso kuv tseg hab moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv, hab muab tej txiv maab qhuav coj moog fij rua tej mlom los kuv tseem hlub puab.”
Yog le ntawd kuv txhaj muab tau kaum tsib dlaim nyaj hab xyaa tawb nplej moog yuav nwg rov lug.
Kuv has rua nwg tas, kuas nwg nyob tog kuv tsi xob moog ua namndlav lossis ntxag hluas nraug le. Txawm yog kuv los kuv yuav nyob tog nwg xwb.

Cov Yixalayees yuav nyob ntev loo ib yaam le ntawd, yuav tsi muaj vaajntxwv lossis cov thawjcoj, tsi muaj khoom fij lossis tsi muaj tej ncej zeb tseemceeb, tsi muaj mlom lossis mojzeeg rua puab pe le.

Tabsis muaj ib lub sijhawm cov Yixalayees yuav rov lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv, hab lug cuag Vaajntxwv Daviv ib tug xeebntxwv. Thaus ntawd puab yuav fwm tug TSWV hab yuav tau txais tej khoom zoo kws nwg muab pub rua puab.

Tug TSWV muaj lug kom cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav. Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le noog tej lug kws has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav tsi muaj kev ncaaj nceeg lossis kev hlub hab tsi leeg paub has tas kuv yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Puab coglug hab tsi ua lawv le tej lug cog tseg ntawd; puab has lug dlaag, tua tuabneeg, ua tubsaab hab ua kev nkauj kev nraug. Muaj kev phem kev qas ntau zuj zug, hab muaj kev tua tuabneeg ib tug taag ib tug tuaj.
Yog le ntawd, lub tebchaws yuav qhuav hab txhua tsaav yaam kws nyob huv lub tebchaws yuav tuag taag. Txhua yaam tsaj hab noog, hab txawm yog tej ntseg huv dlej los yuav tuag taag huv tuabsi.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tsi pub mej leejtwg kom lossis tshev tej pejxeem hlo le, kuv tsuas tshev mej cov kws yog povthawj xwb.
Mej naj nub naj mo ua txhum hab cov cevlug los ua txhum ib yaam le mej. Kuv yuav muab tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws yog mej nam rhuav kuas puamtsuaj moog.

Kuv tsaav tuabneeg raug puamtsuaj vim puab tsi leeg paub kuv. Mej cov kws yog povthawj los tsi leeg paub kuv hab tso kuv tej lug qhuab qha tseg, yog le ntawd kuv txhaj tsi leeg paub mej hab tsi pub mej cov tub lug ua kuv cov povthawj.
“Mej yimfuab muaj povthawj coob, mej yimfuab ua txhum tawmtsaam kuv, yog le ntawd, kuv yuav muab mej tej kev tau ntsejmuag hloov ua kev poob ntsejmuag.
Mej muaj txag npluanuj vim mej ca kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog ua kev txhum, yog le ntawd mej txhaj xaav kuas puab hajyam ua kev txhum ntau zuj zug ntxiv.
Mej yuav raug txim txomnyem ib yaam le tej tuabneeg ntaag! Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej lawv le tej kws mej tau ua lawm.

Mej yuav tau noj tej khoom fij kws yog mej tug, tabsis tseem tshaib plaab qeeg, mej yuav pe hab thov ntau tug vaajtswv kuas mej muaj tubki, tabsis mej yuav muaj tsi taug tubki, rua qhov mej tau tso kuv tseg hab moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv lawm.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tub yog tej cawv txiv maab qub hab tshab ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg tsi meejpem lawm!
Puab moog pe tej mlom ntoo! Puab khov kuam saib tej kws puab xaav paub! Puab tso kuv tseg. Puab muab puab fij rua lwm tug vaajtswv ib yaam le tug quaspuj kws moog ua namndlav.

Puab coj khoom moog fij sau tej roob, hab hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab huv tej qaab ntoo kws muaj nplooj ntxoov nyog sau tej roob, rua qhov tug dluab ntxoov ntxoo ua rua laaj sab ntxag! “Yog le ntawd, mej tej ntxhais txhaj moog ua namndlav hab mej tej nyaab txhaj moog ntxag hluas nraug.

Txawm le ntawd los kuv yuav tsi rau txim rua mej tej ntxhais hab tej nyaab kws ua txhum le ntawd, rua qhov mej cov kws yog txivneej tub moog nrug tej namndlav nyob ua ke huv lub tsev teev mlom,  hab nrug luas koom muab khoom fij rua dlaab rua mlom. Lawv le muaj paajlug has tseg tas, ‘Ib tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj tswvyim yuav raug puamtsuaj.’

“Txawm yog mej cov Yixalayees tsi muab sab npuab kuv los thov kuas cov Yudas tsi xob moog ua txhum le mej ua. Tsi xob moog pehawm huv lub nroog Nkilenkas lossis huv lub nroog Npethavees,  lossis tsi xob moog nyob huv tej nroog ntawd tuav tug TSWV kws muaj sa nyob lub npe coglug le.
Cov Yixalayees tawv ncauj ib yaam le tej neeg zaag. Kuv yuav ua le caag yug tau puab ib yaam le yug paab yaaj huv tshaav zaub?
Cov Yixalayees qaug rua txujkev pe mlom lawm, ca puab ua ywj puab lub sab.
Thaus puab haus cawv txiv maab ntau lawm, puab zoo sab hlo moog sis ntxag, puab nyam kev poob ntsejmuag heev dlua tau ntsejmuag.
Puab yuav raug luas caab moog ib yaam le cua ntsawj, hab puab yuav raug kev txaajmuag vim qhov kws puab fij khoom rua dlaab.

“Cov povthawj, mej ca le noog! Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le ua tuab zoo noog! Cov kws yog vaajntxwv caajceg, mej ca le noog! Tsimnyog mej txav txim ncaaj nceeg tabsis mej tsi ua. Yog le ntawd, mej yuav raug txim. Mej yog rooj ntaa npuj kws caws tog nyob huv lub nroog Mixepas, yog lub vaag kws nthuav rua sau lub Roob Tanpaus,
hab yog lub qhov kws tub heev huv lub nroog Akaxias.  Kuv yuav rau txim rua mej txhua tug huv tuabsi.
Kuv paub Yixalayees lub sab, nwg yeej tsiv tsi dlhau kuv le. Nwg yeej tsi muaj lub sab ncaaj, hab nwg cov tuabneeg yeej tsi tsimnyog pehawm kuv.”
Tej kev phem kev qas kws cov tuabneeg ua ntawd thaiv puab txuj hauv kev tsi pub puab lug cuag tau puab tug Vaajtswv. Puab lub sab xib rua kev pe dlaab pe mlom, puab txhaj tsi leeg yuav tug TSWV.
Cov Yixalayees tej kev khaavtheeb rov kom puab. Puab tej kev txhum ua rua puab qaug, hab cov Yudas nrug puab qaug ib yaam nkaus.
Puab coj puab tej yaaj hab nyuj moog tua fij rua tug TSWV, tabsis tej ntawd paab tsi tau puab dlaabtsi le. Puab nrhav tsi tau tug TSWV, rua qhov nwg tub tso puab tseg lawm.
Puab tsi muab sab npuab tug TSWV; puab tej mivnyuas tsi yog tug TSWV mivnyuas. Yog le ntawd tshuav tsi ntev, puab hab puab tej laj tej teb yuav raug puamtsuaj taag.
Ca le tshuab xyu huv lub nroog Nkinpe-as! Ca le tshuab xyu ceebtoom huv lub nroog Lamas! Ca le qw ntshu nrooj huv lub nroog Npethavees! Cov Npeenyamees ca le moog ntaus rog!
Nub rau txim tub lug yuav txug, cov Yixalayees yuav raug puamtsuaj. Cov Yixalayees, yeej yuav muaj tej xwm nuav lug tag tag le!

Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv chim rua cov Yudas, rua qhov puab cov thawjcoj tau txhij tubrog tuaj tua cov Yixalayees hab txeeb puab lub tebchaws. Qhov ntawd yog le ntawd kuv yuav rau txim nyaav rua puab ib yaam le dlej nyaab.
Cov Yixalayees raug tsimtxom; luas txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws lawm, rua qhov puab pheej moog thov cov tuabneeg kws paab tsi tau tuaj paab puab xwb.
Kuv yuav tso kev puamtsuaj lug rua cov Yixalayees hab yuav ua kuas cov Yudas puag ntsoog moog.

“Thaus cov Yixalayees pum has tas puab raug mob saab heev, hab thaus cov Yudas pum puab tej qhov txhaab, ces cov Yixalayees txhaj moog thov cov Axilias tug vaajntxwv kws muaj fwjchim luj tuaj paab puab. Tabsis nwg tsi muaj cuabkaav cawm tau puab lossis khu tau puab tej qhov txhaab zoo.

Kuv yuav tawmtsaam cov Yixalayees hab cov Yudas ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav. Kuv yuav muab puab dlua ua tej dlaim povtseg. Thaus kuv hai puab moog povtseg, tsi muaj leejtwg yuav muaj cuabkaav cawm tau puab le.

“Vim kuv tsaav tuabneeg tej kev txhum, kuv yuav muab puab tso tseg moog txug thaus kws puab txomnyem txaus, hab puab tig rov lug cuag kuv tsaiv. Tej zag thaus puab raug kev txomnyem le ntawd, puab yuav tig rov lug nrhav kuv.”

Tej tuabneeg has tas, “Peb ca le rov moog cuag tug TSWV! Nwg tau ua rua peb raug mob, tabsis nwg yuav khu peb tej mob kuas zoo; nwg tau ua rua peb tej nqaj to, tabsis nwg yuav qhwv peb tej qhov txhaab puas yog?
Ob peb nub sau nuav nwg yuav muab peb hloov dlua tshab hab peb yuav tau moog nrug nwg nyob.
Ca peb xyum tag kuas paub tug TSWV. Nwg yuav lug cuag peb ib yaam le qhov kaaj ntug kws naj taagkig muaj hab ib yaam le kob naag tshab kws naj xyoo lug rua huv lub nplajteb.”

Tabsis tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yudas hab cov Yixalayees, kuv ua dlaabtsi rua mej? Mej hlub kuv ib yaam le cov fuab tsaus ib plag thaus sawv ntxuv hab ib yaam le tej lwg dlej kws tshaav ntuj tuaj zab ces qhuav taag lawm xwb.
Tub yog vim le ntawd, kuv txhaj khaiv kuv cov cevlug lug qha kuv tej kev txav txim hab kev puamtsuaj rua mej. Mej tub pum tseeb hab paub meej tej kws kuv xaav tau ntawm mej lawm.

Kuv xaav tau mej txujkev hlub kws tsi paub kawg, tsi yog xaav tau tej tsaj kws mej coj tuaj tua fij rua kuv. Kuv xaav kuas kuv tsaav tuabneeg paub kuv tseeb dlua le kws ca puab coj khoom tuaj fij rua kuv.
“Tabsis thaus puab lug txug rua ntawm lub nroog Adaas  xwb; puab tub rhuav kuv tej lug cog tseg lawm.
Nkile-as yog lub nroog kws cov tuabneeg ua phem ua qas hab tua tuabneeg nyob puv nkaus.

Cov povthawj zoo ib yaam le tej tubsaab kws tog rawv ua limham rua tej tuabneeg taug kev, puab tua tuabneeg lawv txujkev kws moog rua ntawm qhov chaw dlawbhuv huv Sekhees, hab txhua yaam kev phem nuav yog puab txhobtxwm ua xwb.
Kuv pum muaj ib yaam kws phem heev nyob huv cov Yixalayees: Qhov ntawd yog kuv tsaav tuabneeg moog pe mlom ua rua puab tsi huv lawm.
“Has rua mej cov Yudas paub tas, kuv tub teem caij yuav rau txim rua mej lawv le tej kev txhum kws mej naj nub ua ntawd lawm.

“Thaus kws kuv xaav khu kuv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees hab ua kuas puab rov vaammeej dlua los kuv tsuas pum tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua xwb. Puab ib leeg dlaag ntxag ib leeg; puab tsoo luas tsev hab nyag luas khoom; puab fuab luas tug ntawm tej kev.
Puab xaav tsi txug has tas, kuv yuav cim ntsoov tej kev phem kev qas kws puab ua, puab tej kev txhum nyob puagncig puab, hab kuv pum ntsoov tsi muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi roog tau le.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Tej pejxeem tuavhuv dlaag ntxag ua phem rua vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv.

Puab suavdlawg puavleej yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab hab tsi sis fwm. Puab tej kev ntxub kub ib yaam le lub qhovtxus kws luas rauv cub ncuav hab cig ntsaa thuav moog txug thaus ncuav sav tsi tsij tawg ntxiv le.
Nub kws puab ua kevcai hawm vaajntxwv, puab muab cawv txhaus vaajntxwv hab nwg cov numtswv kuas qaug hab vwm cawv ua dlog ua dlig.
Puab txujkev tuavhuv kub ib yaam le lub qhovtxus.  Puab txujkev chim ntaiv fwv ib mos, ces thaus kaaj ntug puab txujkev chim txawm cig plawg ib yaam le tej nplaim tawg.
“Vim puab txujkev chim kws kub heev ntawd, puab txhaj muab puab cov thawjcoj tua povtseg. Puab cov vaajntxwv raug tua ib tug dlhau ib tug, tabsis tsi muaj leejtwg tsaa ncauj thov kuv paab le.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Cov Yixalayees zoo ib yaam le lub ncuav kws muab cub sav txug nraab xwb. Puab ca sab kawg rua tej tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig puab.
Puab tub tsi paub has tas, qhov kws puab tso sab rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws ntawd ua rua puab tug zug ntaug zuj zug lawm. Vaajtswv tub teem nub kawg ca rua puab lawm, tabsis puab tsi paub le.
Cov Yixalayees tej kev khaavtheeb rov kom puab lawm. Txawm yog tub muaj tej xwm nuav los puab tseem tsi kaam tig lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Cov Yixalayees lub sab ywjfaab ywjfwj ib yaam le tug nquab kws yaa moog yaa lug tsi paub yuav tsaws qhov twg; thawj zag puab moog thov cov Iziv paab, ces tom qaab ntawd puab tsuas moog thov cov Axilias paab!
Tabsis kuv yuav nthuav vaag cuab puab ib yaam le cuab noog. Kuv yuav rau txim rua puab vim tej kev phem kev qas kws puab tau ua taag lug.
“Puab raug puamtsuaj lawm! Puab tau ntxeev sab rua kuv hab tso kuv tseg. Puab yuav raug kev puamtsuaj. Kuv xaav cawm kuas puab dlim, tabsis puab tsi muaj nplooj sab pehawm kuv tag.

Chim kuv sab, kuv txhaj pub mej muaj vaajntxwv, hab kuv npautawg heev, kuv txhaj coj puab rov lawm.
“Cov Yixalayees txujkev txhum hab lub txim tub muab sau tseg ca lawm, hab tub muab tej ntaub ntawv ntawd khaws ca rua qhov chaw zoo lawm.

Tseem tshuav sijhawm rua cov Yixalayees tau txujsa, tabsis vim puab ruag heev, puab txhaj tsi kaam txais yuav txujsa ntawd ib yaam le tug mivnyuas kws tub yuav yug, tabsis nwg tsi kaam tawm huv leej nam plaab lug le.

Kuv yuav tsi cawm cov tuabneeg nuav kuas dlim huv tubtuag teb lossis paab kuas puab dlim ntawm txujkev tuag lub fwjchim. Kev tuag, ca le tso  koj tej siv npug lug! Tubtuag teb, ca le tso   koj txujkev puamtsuaj lug! Kuv yuav tsi taabncuab tsaav tuabneeg nuav ntxiv lawm.

Txawm yog cov Yixalayees hlub mog nyoos ib yaam le tej nroj tsuag  los kuv yuav tso cov cua kub kub kws nyob saab nubtuaj ntsawj tom taj suabpuam tuaj, kuas puab tej qhov tshij hab tej dlej cag qhuav taag. Cua yuav ntsawj txhua yaam kws muaj nqes moog taag huv tuabsi.

Lub nroog Xamalis yuav raug txim vim nwg ntxeev sab tawmtsaam kuv. Nwg cov tuabneeg yuav tuag taag rua huv tshaav rog; tej mivnyuas mog yuav raug luas tsuj rua huv aav, hab tej quaspuj kws suab mivnyuas yuav raug luas phais.”
Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le rov lug cuag tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Mej txujkev txhum ua rua mej dlawm hab qaug lawm.
Mej ca le rov lug cuag tug TSWV hab tsaa ncauj thov nwg has tas, “Thov zaam peb tej kev txhum hab noog peb tej lug thov, peb yuav ua koj tsaug lawv le peb tau coglug tseg lawm.

Cov Axilias yeej paab tsi tau peb, hab tej neeg kws caij moog ntaus rog yeej tiv thaiv tsi tau peb. Peb yuav tsi hu peb tej mlom has tas, puab yog peb tug Vaajtswv ib zag ntxiv lawm. Tug TSWV, koj yeej taabncuab cov tuabneeg kws tsi pum qaab moog cuag leejtwg le lawm.”
Tug TSWV has tas, “Kuv yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg rov qaab lug cuag kuv dlua. Kuv yuav hlub puab kuas kawg kuv lub sab lub ntsws; kuv yuav tsi chim rua puab ntxiv lawm.

Kuv yuav ua kuas cov Yixalayees zoo ib yaam le thaaj aav qhuav kws tau dlej naag. Puab yuav tawg paaj ib yaam le tej paaj ntoos kws tawg tshab tshab; puab nrhau caag ntsa aav tub ib yaam le tej ntoo peg Lenpanoos.
Puab yuav caj sa hab hlaav dlua kaug tshab; hab yuav zoo nkauj npaum nkaus le tej ntoo roj. Puab yuav tsw qaab ib yaam le tej ntoo cab peg Lenpanoos.
Kuv yuav tau tsomkwm puab dlua ib zag ntxiv, puab yuav cog qoobloo hab yuav txi ncw ib yaam le tsob txiv maab. Puab yuav nto moo lug ib yaam le tej cawv txiv maab peg Lenpanoos.

Cov Yixalayees  yuav tsi quavntsej tej mlom ntxiv lawm; kuv yuav teb puab tej lug thov hab tsomkwm puab. Kuv yuav ua dluab ntxoo roog puab ib yaam le tsob ntoo kws nplooj ntsuab thaws xyoo; kuv yog lub hauvpaug koob moov rua puab.”

Thov kuas txhua tug kws txawj ntse totaub txug tej lug kws sau tseg nuav, hab muab khaws nkaus ca rua nruab sab. Tug TSWV txujkev yeej yog txuj tseeb, hab cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kws taug txujkev nuav yuav tau txujsa, tabsis cov tuabneeg txhum yuav dlawm hab qaug vim puab tsi noog tej lug nuav.
